column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////I have heard lots about this place but never had any real interest in coming here
column2: so I was a little disappointed when my friends choose it for dinner on New Year's Eve. However
column3: I found that I actually really enjoyed my experience here. I was with 5 girls and we each ordered two things and shared. Definite standouts were the bacon-wrapped dates
column6: and the stuffed mushrooms. We also tried the black raspberry sangria
column8: but nothing to write home about. It definitely needed more fresh fruit.
